strapiPost.title: Asian Fresh Supermarket Opens in Lowell
strapiPost.content:
Asian Fresh Supermarket opened this month at 203 N Bloomington St in Lowell bringing a large-scale, Asian grocery store right to the center of NWA.

  • They have it all: Asian Fresh carries everything from fresh meat, vegetables, fruit, housewares, and specialty items.
  • Happy you’re here: Customers are already sharing positive feedback about the store’s organization, inventory, customer service, and an overall excitement about NWA’s new Asian food market. 

Visit Asian Fresh Supermarket online HERE.
